ZGMFToddD,"2016-04-18T05:05:53.487Z","1st Visorak & Titan","

Got this off ToyWiz, &
column2: was the last one they had in stock.

column1: Clearly describes what you get, what the individual sets do &
column2: advertises for the second movie. Instructions are clear &amp
column3: in very good condition. Having only just bee opened after 10 years.

column1: Nice selection, mostly parts ive already gotten before now, as ide from Vohtarak'
column3: the Visorak torso piece. From Sidorak the new parts were the Matoran torso piece, large cogs, 2 pieces from his herding blade, socket connectors, Toa Metru feet&nbsp
column5: a few others. So in total i got 13 new pieces, which includes the mask!&nbsp

column1: This is Bionicle! Come On! there are no minifigures in Bionicle! Well actually there is &
column2: they start in the same year this value pack was released! 2005!&nbsp
column4: none in this pack (even thought they should be called mini-statues).

column1: Vohtarak: Same as all Visorak, the same build. But a nice one, very strait forward but enjoyable. Like all Visorak, same features &
column2: a bit gappy, but i really don&#39
column6: Visorak for so many years, im certainly not disappointed with Vohtarak!&nbsp

column2: what a great build! With the layered &amp
column4: feet followed by the lower arms all great. the lower legs&nbsp
column6: upper arms were only simple but they serve their purpose.&nbsp
column7: Build wise the the Head is so freaking weird!&nbsp
column8: I mean the use of the Toa Metru head is quite miss used, they could have tried to use or make something different piece. Playability wise, its quite good, with the 2 main features, however the most annoying part of this figure is the very loose left arm! I&#39
column9: ve been trying to tighten it up but no luck! Which just makes the left arm completely unable to pose!. Good thing the right works, cause its light enough to move &amp
column10: pose without spinning around. Other that that a nice titan, Get Sidorak if you can (unless you already have him!).

column1: The Mask: only a simple foam mast, when i got it out of the box it was horribly out of shape, but getting better, certainly nice as a bonus good as a collectors piece (&

column2: Sidorak are very nice looking, certainly nice to get one of each 10 years+ after their release, &amp
column3: the Vakama mask is nice to. Couple nice play features for both. Aside from the problem&nbsp
column5: s left arm, this is a really nice collection.

column1: A worth wile collection to get, however depending on where you live &
column2: what site you buy if off, it can&nbsp
column3: be expensive (postage included). So be mindful if you find it online. Price aside, this collection is good for fans young &amp
